Text: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
Author: jim rohn

Text: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different.
Author: donna brazile

Text: Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
Author: eileen caddy

Text: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.
Author: orison swett

Text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
Author: ralph marston

Text: Wherever you are - be all there.
Author: jim elliot

Text: Edison failed 10, 000 times before he made the electric light. Do not be discouraged if you fail a few times.
Author: napoleon hill

Text: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
Author: robert h

Text: Out of clutter, find Simplicity. From discord, find Harmony. In the middle of difficulty lies Opportunity.
Author: albert einstein

Text: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
Author: thomas jefferson

Text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Author: c s

Text: It's always too early to quit.
Author: norman vincent

Text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Author: william james

Text: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
Author: william james

Text: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing.
Author: thomas jefferson

Text: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.
Author: thomas jefferson

Text: To be wholly devoted to some intellectual exercise is to have succeeded in life.
Author: robert louis

Text: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
Author: ayn rand

Text: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
Author: wayne dyer

Text: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
Author: norman vincent

Text: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
Author: thomas jefferson

Text: If you can dream it, you can do it.
Author: walt disney

Text: Know or listen to those who know.
Author: baltasar gracian

Text: The wise does at once what the fool does at last.
Author: baltasar gracian

Text: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
Author: carl sandburg

Text: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.
Author: henry david

Text: What you get by achieving your goals is to as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Author: henry david

Text: There are two levers for moving men -- interest and fear.
Author: napoleon bonaparte

Text: Two purposes in human nature rule. Self-love to urge, and reason to restrain.
Author: alexander pope

Text: Education is not the filling of the pail, but, the lighting of the fire.
Author: william butler

Text: Let what will be said or done, preserve your sang froid immovably, and to every obstacle oppose patience, perseverance and soothing language
Author: thomas jefferson

Text: Don't talk about what you have done or what you are going to do.
Author: thomas jefferson

Text: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
Author: confucius quotes

Text: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
Author: john d

Text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
Author: aristotle quotes

Text: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
Author: john f

Text: Who seeks shall find.
Author: sophocles quotes

Text: Every human action, whether it has become positive or negative, must depend on motivation.
Author: dalai lama

Text: It is common sense to take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly and try another, but above all try something.
Author: franklin d

Text: Always desire to learn something useful.
Author: sophocles quotes

Text: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
Author: epictetus quotes

Text: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
Author: confucius quotes

Text: See only that thou work and thou canst not escape the reward.
Author: ralph waldo

Text: The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.
Author: voltaire quotes

Text: The best morale exist when you never hear the word mentioned. When you hear a lot of talk about it, it's usually lousy.
Author: dwight d

Text: If you would lift me up you must be on higher ground.
Author: ralph waldo

Text: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
Author: dwight d

Text: Every noble work is bound to face problems and obstacles. It is important to check your goal and motivation thoroughly. One should be very truthful, honest, and reasonable. One's actions should be good for others, and for oneself as well. Once a positive goal is chosen, you should decide to pursue it all the way to the end. Even if it is not realized, at least there will be no regret.
Author: dalai lama

Text: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.
Author: ralph waldo

Text: Where you begin doesn't matter. Your willingness to start is what counts.
Author: rhonda britten

Text: Happiness can be defined, in part at least, as the fruit of the desire and ability to sacrifice what we want now for what we want eventually
Author: stephen r

Text: I am the lizard king. I can do anything.
Author: jim morrison

Text: Every morning you are handed 24 golden hours. They are one of the few things in this world that you get free of charge. If you had all the money in the world, you couldn't buy an extra hour. What will you do with this priceless treasure? Remember, you must
Author: source unknown

Text: It is not the horse that draws the cart, but the oats.
Author: russian proverb

Text: To dream of the person you would like to be is to waste the person you are.
Author: source unknown

Text: Walking your talk is a great way to motivate yourself. No one likes to live a lie. Be honest with yourself, and you will find the motivation to do what you advise others to do.
Author: vince poscente

Text: One of the strongest characteristics of genius is the power of lighting its own fire.
Author: john w

Text: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn
Author: harriet stowe

Text: What comes from the heart, goes to the heart.
Author: samuel taylor

Text: Instruction does much, but encouragement does everything.
Author: johann wolfgang

Text: Do or do not... there is no try.
Author: yoda quotes

Text: The aim of an argument or discussion should not be victory, but progress.
Author: joseph joubert

Text: Motivation is like food for the brain. You cannot get enough in one sitting. It needs continual and regular top up s.
Author: peter davies

Text: You are what you think. You are what you go for. You are what you do!
Author: bob richards

Text: There is nothing that fear and hope does not permit men to do.
Author: marquis de

Text: Until we take how we see ourselves (and how we see others) into account, we will be unable to understand how others see and feel about themselves and their world. Unaware, we will project our intentions on their behavior and call ourselves objective.
Author: stephen r

Text: Between stimulus and response, one has the freedom to choose.
Author: stephen r

Text: Motivation is everything. You can do the work of two people, but you can't be two people. Instead, you have to inspire the next guy down the line and get him to inspire his people.
Author: lee iacocca

Text: It's not the will to win, but the will to prepare to win that makes the difference.
Author: bear bryant

Text: You must rouse into people's consciousness their own prudence and strength, if you want to raise their character.
Author: vauvenargues marquis

Text: If you are serious about your goals, drop the conditions. Go directly to your goal. Be your goal! Conditions often disguise strategies for escaping accountability. Why not just take charge and create the experience you are looking for?
Author: eric allenbaugh

Text: God made man to go by motives, and he will not go without them, any more than a boat without steam or a balloon without gas.
Author: henry ward

Text: Purpose directs passion and passion ignites purpose.
Author: rhonda britten

Text: By doing just a little every day, I can gradually let the task completely overwhelm me.
Author: ashleigh brilliant

Text: A champion needs a motivation above and beyond winning.
Author: pat riley

Text: People can't live with change if there's not a changeless core inside them. The key to the ability to change is a changeless sense of who you are, what you are about and what you value.
Author: stephen r

Text: Am I motivated by what I really want out of life -- or am I mass-motivated?
Author: earl nightingale

Text: No one does anything from a single motive.
Author: samuel taylor

Text: We talk on principal, but act on motivation.
Author: walter savage

Text: Leave no stone unturned.
Author: euripides quotes

Text: You have to decide what your highest priorities are and have the courage--pleasantly, smilingly, nonapologetically--to say 'no' to other things. And the way you do that is by having a bigger 'yes' burning inside. The enemy of the 'best' is often the 'good.'
Author: stephen r

Text: I've always been in the right place and time. Of course, I steered myself there.
Author: bob hope

Text: We promise according to our hopes and perform according to our fears.
Author: francois vi

Text: We showed complete concentration and great motivation.
Author: vanderlei luxemburgo

Text: We know nothing about motivation. All we can do is write books about it.
Author: peter drucker

Text: It is no little wisdom for you to keep yourself in silence and in good peace when evil words are spoken to you, and to turn your heart to God and not to be troubled with the judgment of others.
Author: thomas kempis

Text: I often lose motivation, but its something I accept as normal.
Author: bill rodgers

Text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Author: oprah winfrey

Text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Author: jim rohn

Text: You've got to follow your passion. You've got to figure out what it is you love--who you really are. And have the courage to do that. I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams.
Author: oprah winfrey

Text: Whatever touches the nerves of motive, whatever shifts man's moral position, is mightier than steam, or calorie, or lightening.
Author: edwin chapin

Text: We must treasure the achievers of our land because it's they who raise the sights of all the others.
Author: source unknown

Text: If your're not practicing, somebody else is, somewhere, and he'll be ready to take your job.
Author: brooks robinson

Text: I tends to be more motivated by the things I do wrong than when I skate well. I always want to improve even when I do have a strong performance in competition.
Author: matt savoie

Text: Everybody's looking for something negative. I just want to continue being a positive person. ... That is motivation for me. When it's my time to come out and show 'Vince,' then you will get the truth.
Author: vince young

Text: One very important aspect of motivation is the willingness to stop and to look at things that no one else has bothered to look at. This simple process of focusing on things that are normally taken for granted is a powerful source of creativity...
Author: edward bono

Text: Some of us are like wheelbarrows, only useful when pushed and easily upset.
Author: jack herbert

Text: It is simpler and easier to flatter people than to praise them.
Author: jean richter

Text: We would frequently be ashamed of our good deeds if people saw all of the motives that produced them.
Author: francois vi

Text: One of the reasons it has seemed so difficult for a person to change his habits, his personality, or his way of life, has been that heretofore nearly all efforts at change have been directed to the circumference of the self, so to speak, rather than to the center.
Author: maxwell maltz

Text: Companies that solely focus on competition will ultimately die. Thosethat focus on value creation will thrive.
Author: edward bono

Text: Who is sure of their own motives can in confidence advance or retreat.
Author: johann wolfgang

Text: It is in human nature to relax, when not compelled by personal advantage or disadvantage.
Author: johann wolfgang

Text: Begin with the end in mind.
Author: doug flynn

Text: There is no self-made man. You will reach your goals only with the help of others.
Author: george shinn

Text: I would think that Texas has a tremendous amount of motivation building into this game, just as we do, and they don't need any more than that. If that helps them, then it's OK. I can't do anything about it.
Author: pete carroll

Text: I have always grown from my problems and challenges, from the things that don't work out, that's when I've really learned.
Author: carol burnett

Text: Don't spur a willing horse.
Author: proverb proverbs

Text: The whole motivation for any performer is "Look at me, Ma
Author: lenny bruce

Text: When you have reached the pinnacle as a player of what you have always aspired for, what's your motivation? ... Some guys just work their tail off because they want to be good. It's important to them and their pride. Those guys have a better chance to succeed than the guy who did all of that to get here, and now all of a sudden the things that got him here don't seem to be important anymore.
Author: nick saban

Text: It definitely is motivation. It's the reason you want to play your favorite sports and continue on to the next level. You have to stay on top of your academics to play for a Division 1 college. You have to maintain a 3.0 or higher if you want to continue to play.
Author: kyle martinez

Text: There is no point at which you can say, 'Well, I'm successful now. I might as well take a nap.'
Author: carrie fisher

Text: I'm sick and tired of being sick and tired.
Author: fannie hamer

Text: This was definitely a disappointing season because our goal was to advance in the playoffs. It's got to be motivation for us in the offseason.
Author: nicole ohlde

Text: That's just part of it. Everyone can't be a No. 1 seed. For us, though, it gives Tennessee motivation.
Author: maggie dixon

Text: You need to make the distinction between external motivation and internal motivation. While the former has short-term effects, the latter is far more important.
Author: john savage

Text: We had a little more motivation than some of the other teams in the tournament. Certainly everyone wants to win. We had dreams. I know others had dreams too. But our dreams are awfully deep-rooted. This one is pretty special for us.
Author: lance randall

Text: It's definitely a motivation for our players because we lost to them last time we played them.
Author: rich basirico

Text: If you never did you should. These things are fun and fun is good.
Author: dr seuss

Text: Self-motivation is the difference this season. I go out and throw strikes and don't put a lot of pressure on myself. I just try to play and have fun.
Author: mark peterson

Text: You don't have to do anything you don't want to do.
Author: david fink

Text: He that is over -- cautious will accomplish little.
Author: johann friedrich

Text: Next to excellence, comes the appreciation of it.
Author: william m

Text: I don't believe in team motivation. I believe in getting a team prepared so it knows it will have the necessary confidence when it steps on a field and be prepared to play a good game.
Author: tom landry

Text: It's really just the opposite. The atmosphere on campus is so electric, it provides extra motivation.
Author: mike hall

Text: Comfort the afflicted, and afflict the comfortable.
Author: finley dunne

Text: LET YOURSELF GO WITH THE DISEASE,BE WITH IT, KEEP COMPANY WITH IT-THIS IS THE WAY TO BE RID OF IT.
Author: bruce lee

Text: Being willing makes you able.
Author: rhonda britten

Text: When the leader passes over all alike, not making a distinction, then the endeavors of those who are capable of exertion are entirely lost.
Author: hitopadesa hitopadesa

Text: I don't know. I've never seen a team fall apart offensively like this team has. We've tried every motivation tactic with them. At this point and time, I'm ready to send them to putt-putt golf or ride a go-cart. They need to do something to clear their mind and get refreshed and at least be happy to come to the ballpark.
Author: gene stephenson

Text: Everyone on the team is very, very motivated,
Author: scott lynch

Text: Racing with Yamaha gives me a great taste and a great motivation to win; these last two championships have been two of the best,
Author: valentino rossi

Text: You can do everything towards a certain action but you'll achieve nothing if you don't sketch it on paper first
Author: mina tadros

Text: My motivation is very high. I am very pleased to be with a great team like Renault, the world champions. Also, I know I am driving a very quick car this year. My target is to fight for the championship, and I am optimistic I can do that.
Author: giancarlo fisichella

Text: We were playing for No. 30 tonight. That was our motivation. He's a three-year starter and he's been denied half his senior year.
Author: greg nossaman

Text: The motivation has to come from within. We can still play a role in this thing. What I'm looking for from the kids is playing hard and finishing strong.
Author: greg omoto

Text: It's tough to come back. But you've got to find motivation.
Author: steve edmiston

Text: I feel like I was closing the chapter on the whole New Mexico thing. The motivation was definitely there, with a guy I used to play for, former teammates.
Author: jamaal williams

Text: If you must have motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday.
Author: noel coward

Text: We've got to get stronger. A lot of guys have got to get quicker. This is definitely a motivation game to show guys we have to step our game up another level, another notch.
Author: alando tucker

Text: I took that as motivation. Anything that happens, I'll take it as motivation.
Author: carmelo anthony

Text: Any time you really get whipped by an opponent, you have extra motivation to go out and prove not only that you can compete with them, but you can actually pull out a victory.
Author: tommy richardson

Text: Stay the course, light a star,Change the world where'er you are.
Author: richard gallienne

Text: Luke: Uncle Owen, this R2 unit has a bad motivator.
Author: mark hamill

Text: We knew coming in McCallie had a lot of motivation for this one. They've had 365 days to stew about last year, and McCallie is a good team. They have an excellent quarterbackĂÂK so we knew what to expect.
Author: mark davis

Text: When you're 0-10, we only have one place to go and that's up. You have to have some type of motivation to go out and play. We go into every game thinking we can win, man, even though we've had all these close losses.
Author: chris capko

Text: It's got to be a passion. It takes a real drive and real motivation.
Author: brain maas

Text: An employee's motivation is a direct result of the sum of interactions with his or her manager.
Author: bob nelson

Text: Everything [has changed]. It has been a great year. A lot of times you really need that extra motivation to help your teammates. Lot of times, you see a lot of guys that don't really care, but what can you do? A lot of guys are tired. They probably want to go home.
Author: jose guillen

Text: Until victory always
Author: ernesto guevara

Text: There has to be a combination of a education and access to activities. A successful club isn't just having a room with equipment in it, and no reason to go there except for your own motivation.
Author: dan wilson

Text: There's something about the motivation and confidence you feel when you're in first place. We missed out on that opportunity.
Author: curtis martin

Text: I'm not into extra motivation or anything like that. Bottom line, we need to go down there and win.
Author: barbara turner

Text: Personally, the experience is amazing. To see where these kids live and grow up, it's an experience all in itself to just talk to them individually and feel that you have made some kind of positive impact on their life. Most of them really are good kids stuck in a bad situation and we are there to try to bring out that motivation and determination in them to succeed in life. And the kids have started to warm up to us. They are starting to bring their homework more often and have gained more interest in what we have to share with them.
Author: ben schaub

Text: Just to have a win under our belts will give us a lot of motivation.
Author: aubrey taylor

Text: We cannot direct the wind but we can adjust the sails.
Author: source unknown

Text: I never criticize a player until they are first convinced of my unconditional confidence in their abilities.
Author: john robinson

Text: We may think there is willpower involved, but more likelyâ€¦ change is due to want power. Wanting the new addiction more than the old one. Wanting the new me in preference to the person I am now.
Author: george sheehan

Text: At the moment of commitment, the universe conspires to assist you.
Author: johann wolfgang

Text: We should not teach children the sciences; but give them a taste for them.
Author: jean jacques

Text: I found I liked working at that hour, and though I no longer teach, I have remained faithful to that routine. By making writing my first order of business every day, I am giving it enormous symbolic importance in my life, which helps keep me motivated.
Author: dan brown

Text: Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting. So... get on your way!
Author: dr seuss

Text: Help people become more motivated by guiding them to the source of their own power.
Author: paul g

Text: Any corrective phase that will come in the near term could be a shallow one.
Author: joe ismail

Text: Always continue the climb. It is possible for you to do whatever you choose, if you first get to know who you are and are willing to work with a power that is greater than ourselves to do it.
Author: ella wheeler

Text: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
Author: og mandino

Text: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.
Author: saint teresa

Text: Be thine own palace, or the world's thy jail.
Author: john donne

Text: Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself.
Author: swami sivananda

Text: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand.
Author: baruch spinoza

Text: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
Author: victor kiam

Text: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
Author: alfred a

Text: Fear cannot be without hope nor hope without fear.
Author: baruch spinoza

Text: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
Author: sasha cohen

Text: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
Author: eliza dushku

Text: I can, therefore I am.
Author: simone weil

Text: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
Author: ken venturi

Text: I've worked too hard and too long to let anything stand in the way of my goals. I will not let my teammates down and I will not let myself down.
Author: mia hamm

Text: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.
Author: emile zola

Text: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
Author: jim rohn

Text: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
Author: dale carnegie

Text: If you've got a talent, protect it.
Author: jim carrey

Text: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.
Author: rupert murdoch

Text: Leap, and the net will appear.
Author: john burroughs

Text: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
Author: denis waitley

Text: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.
Author: jim rohn

Text: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
Author: jessica savitch

Text: One person with a belief is equal to a force of ninety-nine who have only interests.
Author: peter marshall

Text: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
Author: michael korda

Text: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
Author: kyle chandler

Text: Poverty was the greatest motivating factor in my life.
Author: jimmy dean

Text: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
Author: bo jackson

Text: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
Author: tony robbins

Text: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
Author: peter marshall

Text: The dog that trots about finds a bone.
Author: golda meir

Text: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
Author: mark caine

Text: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
Author: thomas paine

Text: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
Author: muhammed iqbal

Text: The weeds keep multiplying in our garden, which is our mind ruled by fear. Rip them out and call them by name.
Author: sylvia browne

Text: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
Author: john w

Text: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
Author: natalie gulbis

Text: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
Author: gordon b

Text: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
Author: ted turner

Text: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
Author: henry ford

Text: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
Author: flip wilson

Text: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
Author: jack london

Text: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
Author: george s

Text: You never know what motivates you.
Author: cicely tyson
